title: New: Stonefox – All I Want
body:
I’m starting to consider turning CitR into an Aus focused music blog.

There’s just SO MUCH good music coming from down under. Melbourne trio **Stonefox** have just released their gorgeous debut track, _All I Want_. Opening with a plucked guitar line not too far from that found on RY X’s Berlin, before tumbling beautifully into a Laura Marling-esque number, complete with cuttingly honest lyricism. Check it out below.
